segments.text: I would love to be famous and have thousands of adoring fans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I ’ m not sure that I would like all the attention . There have been numerous cases of paparazzi interfering with star ’ s private live in recent years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love being photographed ! If I were famous , I ’ d do interviews for all the top magazines , like cosmo and elle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn ’ t mind having my photo taken a few times or being interviewed once or twice , but it would get tedious after a while . Imagine the things the gossip columnists would write about you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you ’ ll find that many people believe what they read in gossip columns . You ’ d also have to be very careful about every word you said . If you appeared on a chat show and said something silly , it
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you ’ re right about that . I ’ d need a good manager to be my spokesperson . I could do a lot of charity work , which would help a lot of people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a great idea . Which charities would you support ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love children , as you know , so probably a children ’ s charity .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You ’ d have to remember that anything you said or did might reflect on the charity , so you ’ d really need to be very careful . Anyway , I ’ d be the first to buy your posters and I ’ d attend your first book -
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , but actually I was hoping I could ask you to write my biography .
segments.speaker: S1
